name: specifically-clementines
tagline: A shared grocery list app for households
description: Groceries is a self-hosted shared grocery list app built for households. It supports multiple lists, real-time updates, and a mobile-friendly interface for shopping.

features.title: Shared Grocery Lists
features.description: Creates shopping lists accessible to all household members

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Updates lists instantly across all devices

features.title: Item Categories
features.description: Organizes items by store sections for efficient shopping

features.title: Check
features.description: Marks items as purchased with tap or swipe

features.title: Multiple Lists
features.description: Manages separate lists for different stores or purposes

features.title: Recipe Integration
features.description: Adds ingredients from recipes directly to shopping list

features.title: Quantity Tracking
features.description: Specifies quantities and units for each item
